Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using PINK1-deficient fruit flies and mice.

Readout description.Result Description: Mitochondrial Complex I activity was reduced by 50% for the variant NM_032079.3:c.1499C>T.

Biological replicates.Description: Three biological replicates were performed in fruit flies and mice.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type cDNA was used as a positive control in fruit flies and mice.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control in fruit flies and mice.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used for statistical analysis in fruit flies and mice.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: 50% mitochondrial Complex I activity on day 7.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Less than 20% mitochondrial Complex I activity on day 7.
